PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Character encoding for temporary files, must match the encoding of your tagger data files

PARAMETER.NAME: regex
PARAMETER.COMMENT: regex to process tagger ouptut, this must contain capturing groups which can then be referenced in the feature mapping

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: annotation set in which annotations are created

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: annotation set in which annotations are created

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnMissingInputAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Throw an exception when there are none of the required input annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: inputTemplate
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Template used to build the line of input to the tagger from the features of a single annotation. Should include ${feature} placeholders which will be replaced by the value of the corresponding feature from the annotation.

PARAMETER.NAME: featureMapping
PARAMETER.COMMENT: mapping from feature names to matching groups, this must include a mapping for 'string'

PARAMETER.NAME: taggerBinary
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Name of the tagger command file

PARAMETER.NAME: taggerDir
PARAMETER.COMMENT: directory in which to run the tagger

PARAMETER.NAME: updateAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: do you want to update annotations or add new ones?

PARAMETER.NAME: inputAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: annotation used as input to tagger

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnUnmappableCharacter
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should the tagger fail if it encounters a character which is not mappable into the specified encoding?

PARAMETER.NAME: preProcessURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: JAPE grammar to use for pre-processing

PARAMETER.NAME: postProcessURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: JAPE grammar to use for post-processing

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
